website_summaries.verdict: A bargain that will easily last for the life of your car.
pros: Available in 3 colors, comes with anti-slip backing, and easy to trim
Durable enough to last for the life of your car
cons: Mats smell in summer when they get hot

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for $20!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality mats for $20 shipped. High quality rubber, big lip on the outside to catch spills, rocks and dirt. Easy to remove/install, carpet catcher isn't a gimmick, they stay pretty well put when driving around. Won't slip under your feet. I recommend keeping your original mats underneath so you wont have to worry about this ever slipping. Two complaints: 1. Not wide enough for all vehicles, especially the back mats. Wish they were bit wider. 2. The carpet claws are actually great, I just wish they had some up at the top of the mat as well. Pros: 1. Cheap 2. High quality 3. Not a bad rubber smell
customer_reviews.author: G. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: These mats are really really great mats!! My boyfriend said not to get them because they would look too bulky but I'm so glad I decided to do it anyways!! I just got a new car and wanted some extra protection and to keep the carpet ones in good condition and these really do the job well. They were very easy to cut, I used some regular kitchen scissors and I only needed to cut the drivers side the others for perfect. I only took one pic but later I will post more of them in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could return them! First, they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could return them! First, they are small. They say "you can cut to size" but the original size of the back seat mats were too small right out of the box for my Prius. Cars don't get much smaller than a Prius. The second problem, which is worse--they do not clean well. I have tried scrubbing them on numerous occasions--the embedded dirt will not come off; no matter how long and hard I scrub them The surface of the mats now has an all over grimy appearance. The rubber surface seems to absorb the dirt for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly in my Maxima
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. Fits perfectly in my 2013 Nissan Maxima. I did not have to cut it. The back ones however seem a tad small.
customer_reviews.author: DejaLiyah

customer_reviews.title: These mats have a horrible smell. Even spraying them down with a water ...
customer_reviews.text: These mats have a horrible smell. Even spraying them down with a water hose and leaving them out to dry didn't get rid of the smell. It's nauseating and probably not very good for my health. I threw these away and bought weathertech mats instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits In My 2015 Mazda 3!
customer_reviews.text: These look and fit great in my 2015 Mazda 3! I barely had to trim. (Trimming was an absolute breeze anyway) They are great quality and fairly durable! My only wish is that the small back seat mats should be bigger. I'm usually a stickler for having brand name product in my car i.e. I almost bought the $100+ Mazda brand weatherproof mats but this was such a better deal and gets the job done just the same!
customer_reviews.author: ivette

customer_reviews.title: look nice if you can get past the smell
customer_reviews.text: STINKY MATS. Sometimes you just have to give your wife credit. She warned me it wasn't a good idea to buy mats online as you can't test the smell. But I did it anyway, and ended up with the stinky set. I have them strung over work horses in the sun in hopes of the smell will go away, but it's been a few days and nights now and no such luck. They seem to be well made if you can get past the smell. Be smarter than I was, not a good thing to buy online.. Update took a few months but much less smelly..
customer_reviews.author: mike in mass

customer_reviews.title: The middle mats fit great. I love them
customer_reviews.text: Wow so I didn't expect these to be as high quality as they are. They are thick rubber and fit my Dodge Durango very well. The right front mat probably should be cut but idc lol. The left front fits perfectly. The middle mats fit great. I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell that never goes away
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these; they smell terrible and it never goes away. I put them in my car and immediately there was this strong odor of rubber that wouldn't go away. I tried airing them outside for a week and it didn't work. I should have just returned them, but instead I left them outside longer to see if they would get better. Foolishly I missed the deadline to return them and was stuck with them. After they had been outside almost six months, through all kinds of weather (rain, snow, heat, cold) I found them outside and they STILL had the awful rubber smell. I just threw them away. Do not waste your money on these.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brassard

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting smell that NEVER goes away!
customer_reviews.text: These floor mats not only took weeks to arrive, but the chemical smell leaching off of them is truly nauseating. I let them air out on my deck for TWO MONTHS and finally tried putting them into my car last night. I get in my car this morning and the smell is so strong that I had to pull over and throw them in my trunk. They're going straight into a garbage can my first chance. Do not buy these!
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: 3 months and already worn out!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband three months ago and he has already worn through the drivers side mat. He drives 50 min per day and doesn't have to get in and out alot so the wear should be minimal. We are quite disappointed in the quality and advise the that you buy a different product!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rath

customer_reviews.title: 2003 Honda Accord 4dr, trim not needed
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this for a 2003 Honda Accord 4 door. It fits great and I didn't need to trim the fronts at all. It stays in place and doesn't move around. I get in and out of the vehicle constantly in all kinds of terrain. I live in Western Washington and this rainy season has been one of the worst I can remember in awhile. These have exceeded my expectations and I'm glad I got these to protect my carpets!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Front set is OK, rear set is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I bought these as a cheaper alternative to the custom fit floor mats. They front ones are OK. They don't nearly fit as well as the more expensive ones, but the are OK. The rear ones look like I put a small napkin on the floor. Really tiny. People have laughed at the they are so small. There is no way these would protect the floors from wet or muddy shoes. I guess you get what you pay for. I do not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR PEOPLE WITH DIRTY JOBS
customer_reviews.text: wonderful car mats.. my husband works in insulation and ALWAYS gets foam and batts all over his new car. he asked that i purchase these and they are wonderful.. no more trying to get foam out of the fabric mats.. all the dirt and foam pieces fall onto the durable mats and we just take them out shake them out.. spray them off.. put them back in the car.. that simple.. they fit wonderfully in his Honda civic.. i definitely recommend them for husband with dirty jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Jess

customer_reviews.title: Size was small
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I bought it for my 17 Honda Accord but it did not fit correctly in my car. it's so small for the foot area.
customer_reviews.author: Adit

customer_reviews.title: Work Fine If You’re Not Persnickety!
customer_reviews.text: These were a great price and are working, after some cutting, in my Ford Escape. They are not an exact fit but are terrific for the price and work after a little effort. Depending on how you cut them, they will cover more area than the ones you can get, for a fee, when you buy your SUV from Ford. I’m not hard on my floors but I do live in the snowy NorthEast with lots of dried leaves in the Fall! These will save my car carpets and keep them pristine.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Slides Around the Floorboard, Won't Stay Put
customer_reviews.text: Spend more and buy the expensive, fitted brand, like Weather Tech. The driver side still slips around and gets under clutch and gas, does not stay put on carpet, has now changed shape due to it being behind pedals, and one of the tabs that's supposed to help it stick to carpet broke off within two weeks. Like that they are easier to clean, but my main point in buying was to have something that didn't slide around. Bad choice. Thought the Armor All brand meant better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Worfsdad

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for a 2013 VOLT
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I've wanted all-weather floor mats for a long time now and I almost spent more than $100 on the custom fit mats but I just couldn't get myself to pay that much. With the recent storms I was in desperate need of these mats as I live out in the country and there's a lot of mud/dirt. These Armor All 78840 are perfect! I have a 2013 Volt and I just had to trim a small portion on the driver side mat and it fit perfectly and for $20, you just can't be that.
customer_reviews.author: AC_Discounts

customer_reviews.title: Rubber fits Rav 4 like a condom
customer_reviews.text: This rubber turned out o be the perfect fit for the front seats of our Toyota SUV. No trim or adjustment necessary. I prefer these much more than the basic carpet mats that came with the vehicle. It looks & feels more durable, easier to clean and better to protect the flooring from footwear dirt or other nastiness. The two back seat floor seat pieces are good fits too
customer_reviews.author: Heavy Muscle

customer_reviews.title: Long floor mat fits poorly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 2017 Honda Pilot. The front driver and passenger mats fit nicely, with about an inch space in width. The mats stay out and do not shift much underneath your feet. The second row mat, however, is about an in or two longer than necessary...this is after we trimmed off the sides too! So we chopped the long piece in half, straight down the middle just so the middle does not raise up like a tent. I would think that majority of SUVs will have this issue with the second row being that the 2017 Pilot is really a pretty wide vehicle in itself already.
customer_reviews.author: mamabear

customer_reviews.title: These Look Nice
customer_reviews.text: When my husband wanted to switch out the carpet-type floor mats in our new car, I dreaded getting some ugly plastic ones. I was really surprised when these arrived. First, they arrived quickly. Secondly, the are very nice. They're not the faded looking black color one sees on so many replacement mats. They're very dark and sturdy. They have ridges around the edge, so one can cut them to fit the vehicle perfectly. And they have little dealies at the top of the driver side one that catch on the car's carpet ... these won't be sliding around. These were a very good purchase at a fair price for the excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Okie

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to clean, look dirty after minimal use
customer_reviews.text: These will certainly do their job if you are trying to protect the carpet in your car, so in that sense they are fine. They are relatively easy to cut to fit to your vehicle’s shape. I’m giving it 3 stars because after owning and using these mats for a few months, they look horrible. Whatever it’s made of seems to attract dirt and grime and hang on to it like glue. I tried to wipe them off but it did nothing to them. Black would definitely be a better color choice if you care about their appearance. As soon as I can find a better option I plan on getting rid of these.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey B

customer_reviews.title: Molds to fit your floor
customer_reviews.text: Dig it exactly what I was looking for. Purchased slightly used new car. And it came with black carpeted floor mats. After a little while I noticed the black was coming off on my back of my shoe. I also go camping and I'm a bit active so I wanted something that wouldn't attract dirt or be hard to clean. These rubber mats are perfect. They feel sturdy and there are cutouts at the Top If you want to mold them to your floor that better. Very pleased they should last me the lifetime of my car
customer_reviews.author: Grey Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I traded from fabric floormats to these ones and will never go back. These mats are made for mud, dirt, spills, and so much more! They say you have to cut them to fit but I drive a 2015 Nissian Altima and all 4 fit perfectly! I did like that since they are a very heavy duty plastic you get the new car smell for a few weeks from them!! If you have kids or just travel with people I would suggest switching to these!! clean up is a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Ruben0329

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty at all
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised. Very flimsy. The fort week I used them they gathered under my brake pedal. I felt them in time to fix them. Those little orange spikes that’s supposed to stop them from sliding don’t stop anything. I see these thing in the dumpster in a couple months. I’ll be perfectly honest. I’m starting to lean to going back to the brick& mortar stores on a lot of stuff on amazon. Just can’t go by the ratings
customer_reviews.author: roger blassingame

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a set of these as a gift for a friend that purchased a new car. At $20 a set you can’t go wrong. The car she bought was a 2018 Mitsubishi Mirage G4. A tiny little car. These fit great in it. There was no trimming needed for the fronts. They stay in place really well. The only negative as many other reviewers have stated is that yes, the back mats are really small. They don’t cover much space. Even in her tiny Mitsubishi it’s very obvious. But they are better than nothing in the back. And how often do most have people in the back? Occasionally? For the price these are a really good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Adam's LazyBoy Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2016 Toyota Corolla Sport..alright. I’d say about 90% good enough to protect from dirt and yuck weather. As you can see from the pictures, the mats don’t cover the entirety of the original floor mats the car came with. I decided to leave the removable covers for the slip resistant cleats on because they’re exactly like golf shoe bottoms and I was worried they would permanently ruin my carpet. However all in all they’re great rubber mats for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: Thicker than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Overall they are a good product. I did have to do some trimming as expected, and I had to actually separate the two for the back floor board, they would not lay down properly while connect for my Chrysler 300. The front passenger side is a little to wide in the back near the seat, I didnt want to cut it down more because when you put your feet in the snow, mud whatever would drop onto the edges of the carpet. But over all I like them and they will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: LCooper

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The product looks exactly like described, Sturdy/ smooth material and seems like it will be durable for most types of weather. I feel like most people will be happy with this item and it was very affordable. The only thing I found to a bit displeasing is the back row mats since they fill up the majority of the area where the back seats are but overall happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JR.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly how it's shown and described here.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly how it's shown and described here. They are just thick enough to work! Can't wait to try them out. I only had to make cutouts on the driver's side. See photos.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Dufner

customer_reviews.title: Good mats not easy to clean though
customer_reviews.text: I will admit I love these were not that much to buy. I also love how long they have held up since I have purchased these floor mats. Although cleaning these is very difficult due to all the notches in the mat which I have issues with when I clean my car. Dirt gets stuck into those notches and make it difficult to get out even if you hose or vacuum the mat. But I give them 5 stars for how long they have lasted and there price. Would buy definitely again.
customer_reviews.author: Shayne Layman

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality heavy duty mats. They are designed to go over carpet because them have a pin that sticks in the carpet to prevent movement. So know if you have a work truck with no carpet that you will have to cover or remove the pin. It was a simple procedure and did not harm mat. These mats are heavy and offer excellent protection. They feel nice under your feet and help with fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: Book a Day

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Substantial for the Price
customer_reviews.text: These are surprisingly thick and substantial for the money. The front ones fit my Avalon w/out being cut, the back ones are a little small. The grey color matches the rug and interior perfectly. We've paid a fortune in the past for durable mats with deep "channels" for water/snow. These are not quite up to that standard but are a fraction of the cost. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: AmazUser

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than it looks. Cut to fit. Deep dish design will hold water.
customer_reviews.text: These are massive deep-dished floor mats. Pros: - Deep dish, holds water, mud, dirt, everything. - Quality design, feels durable. - Sleek aesthetics Cons: - Way bigger than it looks - Cut to fit. I had to cut so much it is kind of ridiculous. It isn't even close to easy to trim these massive floor mats. Still does not fit correctly in my 1998 Chevy S10
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Best ones on Amazon. They are strong cover a lot of gaps
customer_reviews.text: Pro's: They don't smell. They are strong. Cut them any size you want. Easy to rinse and clean. They stick to the carpet from moving around. Shipping was fast Con: None, just got to cut it where it'll cove the gaps. Easy with scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Murad Saleh

customer_reviews.title: Fit great
customer_reviews.text: Weather tech floor mats were not available for my new 2020 Toyota Highlander yet. That is what I purchased for my other car and left them in when I traded it. Bought these for new car and they fit great with only a little trimming and I think will last as long as the expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Hate to shop

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Rubber Smell
customer_reviews.text: These mats have a horrible chemical smell. I thought that with some time, the smell would fade away, but after almost a month, the rubber/chemical smell remains. The smell forced me to drive with the windows down every day since it would make me nauseous. I just took them out of my car and will not be using them.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M.

customer_reviews.title: They're ok, backseat ones are small.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to cloth ones these are good for cleaning and that's about it. The back ones are pretty small. The front ones are ok but the edges seem to get in the way where you want to rest your foot. They have no traction so your feet stay slippery if wet, next time I get some textured mats I want to find some with that actually let you dry your shoes a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D'Auria

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to tailor to any car. Affordable too
customer_reviews.text: My daughter rides horses and we needed to protect her carpet. Gave these a try and they worked perfect in her 2017 Mazda 3. The rubber is nice and flexible and, it was easy to drop them in and decide where to cut them to fit. The rubber is soft and easy to cut with household scissors. Since they are flexible, they mold right to the floor and they have ridges around the outside to keep water from dripping off onto the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Bman in the Sunshine State

customer_reviews.title: Great car mats, good value!
customer_reviews.text: My car has carpet mats and I hate them, they pick up everything and I like to garden, it's a battle. I don't have to suffer anymore, I pull them out (they are sturdy!) hose them down and they are clean! Light vacuuming, and the car looks good. The fit is nice - ample coverage.
customer_reviews.author: L. McCallion

customer_reviews.title: Fits in 2013 Hyundai Elantra
customer_reviews.text: With winter coming, I wanted something to protect my floors from salt and slush. These fit nice in the Elantra, only had to make a small cut for the drivers side floor, to fit the gas pedal. Only thing I wish was different, was if the ones for the back seat were a little bigger. I don't have a lot of passengers in the back though, so it's not a big deal. These are definitely sturdy enough to protect the floor for a snowy Ohio winter.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Brown

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great replacement to my carpet floor mats. They are easy to cut (I'd recommend a box cutter rather than scissors) and looks really good too. They even have little "claws" on the bottom of the front mats so they're not sliding around. I had to trim them for my 2017 Subaru Forester - not a problem!
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: By the reviews of these mats, I thought they would be a nice durable rubber. They are cheap feeling, and when cut, the edges look bad. I have had much better $30 mats from auto parts stores. I will have to look at this regrettable purchase every day for the next 6 months. Thats how long i think they may last before falling apart. I drive an 01 tacoma, and the fit is horrible as well. The good news is that these may push me towards getting the $150 lazer cut ones from the fancy floor mat companies.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality mats for $20, they do the job
customer_reviews.text: Good quality rubber, lip on the outside to catch spills, rocks and dirt. Easy to remove/install, they stay pretty well put when driving around. Won't slip under your feet. keeping your original mats underneath is a must so you wont have to worry about this ever slipping. Front mats are wide enough for Nissan Altima without cut, the back mats could be bit wider. The carpet claws do the job, they should have them up at the top of the mat as well. Not a bad rubber smell at all. We'll see how they hold up over time. Good quality mats for $20.
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoMan

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only about a year in normal city weather.
customer_reviews.text: The picture speaks for itself. Lasted about 1 year in midwest weather, only driving in the city. I never had gravel or dirt on them. I liked them just for the look and for water when I would track snow into my car. They were pretty low cost, but you get what you pay for. I wish they had heavy duty for just the front seats. Two stars b/c they at least lasted a year.
customer_reviews.author: STK

customer_reviews.title: I wish the rear mats were bigger..
customer_reviews.text: I was in search of all rubber mats. These are great except for the fact that the rear mats are so tiny. They don’t cover the entire carpet space which is what I was hoping for. I have a Honda Civic, so it’s not abnormally large back there whatsoever. They are small squares inside of the carpet space that are big enough for your shoes to fit. For the price I decided to keep them.. plus no one hardly sits in my back seat anyway so it doesn’t need as much protection as the front seats.
customer_reviews.author: Special Bell

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality/Horrible Odor
customer_reviews.text: Okay so these Matt’s are great for the price, and they fit fine in my 2018 Buick Encore...but the smell! I had to take them out of my car. I’ve washed them with vinegar twice now to try to get the mothball smell out. It’s so strong! I can’t have them in my car because of them smell. I currently have them in a spare now airing out for the past two weeks. Still no improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Trinitey

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to cut and fits well.
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved to Hawaii and bought a used car that came with mats that didn't fit at all. I got these to help fit the mats to the car along with an easy way to keep the floor clear of sand, etc. The mats fit well in the backseats and passenger. The driver side isn't the best fit but it still covers more than the other mats I had and have looked at. They stay put, thanks to the carpet teeth, so no complaints! The price is great too! Update: Two months after installing these mats, they are still in the exact spot I placed them in originally! They don't move at all. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: I Am A Human

customer_reviews.title: Pretty durable and great price - except will not fit dodge charger
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can't really complain. However, in my 2018 dodge charger they just do not fit, regardless of the way I cut it. Another bummer is how there is no holes to match up with the small grip stud thing sticking out of my floor. I suppose I could just cut a hole in this so it'll fit. Be aware, the smell is pretty strong at first so you might want to take these out of the packaging and let them hang outside for a couple days before putting in your car. It killed my new-car smell for me lol.
customer_reviews.author: The Kansas City Wildcat

customer_reviews.title: Pretty durable universal fit not meant for my suv
customer_reviews.text: These are okay for the basic needs of floor mats but will probably get custom ones in another month or two. By the time I cut and placed the front ones where they fit I lost 25% of the mat. I have a little over half the floor covered for the driver side and passenger. You just have to keep your feet still if they’re muddy or dirty. My Highlander isn’t a good match for these.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana

customer_reviews.title: Front mats covers 90% and rear mats cover about 80% on honda accord 2013
customer_reviews.text: doesn't quite fit a honda accord 2013, but good enough. the driver side, i had to cut the left side of the mat but the foot rest still gets caught by the mat. it isn't snug. front passenger was ok, i didn't do any cutting on that side, still not snug. also the 2 front mats still moves around a little. the 2 rear mats does not cover the whole area, there was still 1 inch room from the bottom and sides of the rear mats. the top of the rear mats do not do under the seats. since there are no rug catchers on the rear mats, it moves around alot.
customer_reviews.author: MARKO

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mats. I drive a 2020 Honda Civic and I wanted to protect the carpets I have now since it rains a lot sometimes in Virginia. I was skeptical at first but I got them and the driver side and passenger side fit perfectly I didn’t need to cut them. However, I will say the mats for the back seats are a little smaller than anticipated but that’s okay because no one ever sits back there. I’m much more worried about my passenger and drivers side. I would say aside from the small backseat mats they’re really nice quality and have a lot of life to them!
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice mats for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 2008 Volvo C70 and covers the front floor nicely, not exact fit but a great winter/spring snow and mud coverage. Trim with scissors or utility knife for the best fit. The backs were too big but still work well by folding up toward seat. Nice water and sand traps to keep off carpets. Installed these right over existing carpet mats, also has spike grabbers so they don’t move. Also no strong chemical/rubber smell.
customer_reviews.author: joe langenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long?
customer_reviews.text: When I bought my new car, I checked 3 stores for mats. All they had was beige. I wanted to protect the carpet, so I bought the beige as an interim purchase. They looked so bad. After 6 months I finally remembered to order black mats. These mats from Armor All look great.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Signor

customer_reviews.title: Good mats!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 2002 Suzuki Vitara (JLS). Passenger side fit with no trimming. Drivers side floor board has a "foot rest" on the left side. Used a piece of paper to make a template and easily trimmed the mat to fit using a pair of old workshop scissors. To clean them, I just toss 'em on the driveway and blast them with the hose. Rubber smell went away in a day or two. These things are working great.
customer_reviews.author: SnoShu

customer_reviews.title: Good for a 2003 Toyota Corolla.
customer_reviews.text: Fits ok in a 2003 Toyota Corolla. I did not have to do any trimming. Looks good too. Only problem is, at first, the smell is really bad. But, after a week, with me sometimes leaving the windows open a bit, the smell is fading. Great mats for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Meninga

customer_reviews.title: Great value set of floor mats
customer_reviews.text: Living in the Midwest, I needed to invest in a set of rubber floor mats that were more durable for the various types of inclement weather we encounter. These mats fit well in my Nissan Sentra and have remained durable for two years. They do tend to get dirty easily with residue from the snow, ice, and rain, but are easy to spot clean. The backseat mats are smaller than expected, but I keep the cloth mats that came with my vehicle under them as a safeguard.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh Warren

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these.
customer_reviews.text: These didn't last 3 months before some of the thin diamond pattern started tearing and holes developed. Too late to return them at this point. Really disappointed because I commute 3 miles to work and haven't hardly put 1000 miles on my trailblazer since I picked up the new mats. Very thin, low quality floor mats. Apparently made with the lowest quality rubber or plastic available. Do yourself a favor and pass on these.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Pay for what you get!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom as she had been wanting rubber mats for her new 2020 Ford Escape but didn’t want to pay a ton since she will only use them in the winter. They are a good universal fit for any car and the guidelines to cut and fit was easy enough for her to do. They do the job of protecting her floors. She is not a big driver and is in her car pretty minimally, so they work well. For anybody who has heavy traffic in and out of cars, it could be a hit or miss.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits good on my 2007 Scion tC . I could trim it a smidge but I chose not to because it doesn’t move and I don’t have to move my seat forward as much . But if I did have to trim it would just be the slightest bit .
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: don't seem to stay in place worth a darn... :(
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to finally get these mats, I have had them on my wish list for almost a year and finally though "I'll get new mats for my everyday car and transfer my old mats to my project" well these slide around a lot in my 2016 Civic.. to the point that I put the old Sams Club mats back in and cut these down for project Miata.
customer_reviews.author: FrankP

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money and strong material
customer_reviews.text: It has some smell that goes away after like a month, but It worked well in my Mustang 2015; however, the smaller mats were not exact fit for the rear. Material is very good. Tested with my cat who tried to scratch it but he couldn't get his way and walked away hehe.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but smells bad
customer_reviews.text: Does the job and well priced, but it really does smell. Some reviews say they do while other said theirs didn’t. I chanced it and got a definite stinker. I’m hoping the smell will fade after a while...
customer_reviews.author: Baby Safe

customer_reviews.title: Hundreds saved and a milk rescue
customer_reviews.text: Dealer kept insisting everyone loves the all weather mats on my new car, when we warned him we weren't going to get all the extras. He wanted literally hundreds. Just, no. It's the south, so it didn't really occur to me to get all weather mats, but I figured I could get something cheaper. Fast forward a week after they arrive and milk has spilled all over the floor of my front passer floor, but not a drop on my precious new car. Thank you for saving the day!
customer_reviews.author: cbrice

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised Good quality, heavy duty mats
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my daughters 2019 KIA Optima leased vehicle in order to protect the rugs when I return the vehicle. I purchased the regular mats instead of the heavy duty because I did not want the mats to be too bulky/truck looking, but I was concerned that they would be too flimsy. Not at all! The mats are heavy duty. They look durable and should be perfect in protecting the interior car rug from rain water and any spills that could occur. I am pleasantly surprised at the quality and very impressed with the $20 price. Will definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Ray0603Top Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small and slide around a lot but they seem they would be pretty durable. You cannot use these directly on the floor of the car because they slide around like crazy with no grip. I had to purchase carpeted mats custom for my car that would fit into the locks. I put these on top and the don’t slide as much. I have a 2016 Toyota Corolla but they probably fit smaller cars better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't fit well on driver side of my Lexus UX
customer_reviews.text: I had to trimmed a little on the gas petal side so it's a little exposed to the elements, but the left side is more of a fit problem. My car has a foot rest for the left foot. I had to trimmed as much as possible on the left but the foot rest is still in the way so the mat can not fit properly. After trimming, the mat moves around which makes it unsafe because it can get caught on the gas pedal.
customer_reviews.author: Irving_B

customer_reviews.title: I don't get weathertech
customer_reviews.text: I never understood why people buy a car with carpet and then cover it up? These mats work perfectly fine and I am in upsate New York, not exactly mild winter weather.....i take my car branded mats out for the winter and put these in. They will do the trick. seems crazy to me to have car carpet all covered up.....what's the point? anyway flexible , fit perfect to my 200 Chrysler Convertible. has a rim to catch the snow melt, and most important flexible enough not to freeze in a weird shape
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: My 2015 Honda was started to get worn out as far as the floor mats. I found these on Amazon and decided to buy them. I do a lot of traveling in my car, so the all season rubber mats sounded great. These have help up great. I got these about 6 months ago, and have had no problem with them. They do slip out of place sometimes, but most of the time they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Texas Gal

customer_reviews.title: 2015 Scion XB
customer_reviews.text: I put these for my 2015 Scion XB . I didnt need to trim them and overall carpet coverage is decent in the front foot wells . They are pretty heavy weight wise which was refreshing in this make it cheaper world . Makes me think they will be durable over the long haul . The little orange spiked disks on the bottom are sharp to dig in and hold them in the carpet so watch your fingers when unpacking . I like that they dont have a ton of crevices etc for sand to hide from the vacuum etc etc - should be easy to bang off and clean .
customer_reviews.author: JOHN F

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, fits a 2019 C 300
customer_reviews.text: My mom wanted me to look for rubber floor mats to put in her new Benz C300. She wanted something that would be protective, but not expensive. I found these and they work really well. My stepfather is a slob, and tracks in all sorts of dog hair, dirt, and leaves everywhere he goes. These mats ensure the stock Mercedes carpets stay in great condition and collects all the dirt and other nasty stuff he steps in.
customer_reviews.author: r6barfly

customer_reviews.title: They're quality but not a good shape.
customer_reviews.text: So I like the heavy duty rubber and the fact that they have little spiky things that help them stick to the carpet. However, the fact that they are symmetrical leaves a lot of carpet exposed. Especially in the areas where my sandy shoes spend the most time. In the top corners. Slightly disappointing. Otherwise, perfectly acceptable floor mats.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Nice mats for 78 Mark V
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a 78 Lincoln mark V. They fit exactly right, with a tiny bit of trimming under the accelerator. Passenger side fit exactly. The mats are rather thick, with deep grooves to catch any water that happens to find its way in there. There is a boarder which is higher than the rest of the mat, which will trap any water from leaking over the edge onto the carpet. If you have a clutch, these might be a bit thick...might prevent the clutch safety switch from closing since the mat will be hard to compress.
customer_reviews.author: fmwardalotTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great for Scion tC
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even need to cut it to make it fit. It poked me when I first opened it because I was unaware it has thorns in it to keep it in the car carpet. It does a nice job covering the layer of crap on my car floor and making my car look cleaner and nicer. No one ever goes in my car because I don't have friends, but I like to imagine that if I did have friends then they'd be impressed with the floor mats too.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: My dad loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my father on Father's Day and he loves it. It makes his truck look brand new again after having vaccumed and conditioned. He's happy with the entire pack
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: These are great for those who travel to the beach all the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great for those who travel to the beach all the time. I’m able to easily shake off all that sand without much of an effort or a full detail. They were able to fit both front and back of a sedan. I wasn’t needing to trim any excess off of the siding but, it is an easy fixer if they were too big for any vehicle. I highly recommend something like this for the constant beach goers.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Horrible VOC Stench
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival the mats smelled so strongly of out-gassing VOCs that I could not install them in the car. Instead, they have been hanging out on the porch in Hawaii 90F+ heat for over three weeks and continue to out-gas VOCs. They will remain hanging in the fresh air until the odor stops or I get more frustrated and discard them as it is too late for a return.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dahlberg

customer_reviews.title: Stated pros are a big con
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should, I use a Honda Civic 2017. Rubber material has nothing to be complained about and cutting it to fit perfectlt works well. What doesnt work so well is the orange spikes on the bottom that are suppose to keep it secure. They have almost no impact on securing the mat to the floor and would always move. Hopefully they rework it so it can stay in place a lot better. Overall, would not buy a second time due to it sliding around.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Marinas

customer_reviews.title: It didn't fit my car but it doesn't slip or moves
customer_reviews.text: It did not fit my 2015 Jeep Cherokee, but I like it so much I use it anyways. The price was unbeatable for the 4 piece set, it's a good, strong, durable quality material, it's easy to clean and keeps the carpeted mat from getting wet and moldy. Although it's not the right fit it stays in place and doesn't slip. It has rained a few times since I got it and I love that I could run into the car with my feet wet and the mats will retain the water until I just take it out and wipe it clean.
customer_reviews.author: D1stkiss

customer_reviews.title: Works ok.
customer_reviews.text: Has a bad smell that takes weeks to get out of car. I expected more of a pliable rubber Matt but this is more of a more inflexible plastic type. It works, I'll keep it. But wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R.K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy duty mats at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy duty car mats at a decent price. They were shipped flat, so no creases to work out. I installed them in my 2017 Honda Civic Sedan and had to do very little customizing. I only had to make a small cut on the driver's mat to accommodate the left foot rest pad. Otherwise, they fit pretty well right out of the box. I think the Carpet Claw is a nice feature, but on my car they line up right where the mounting post is for my stock car mats, so they don't make contact with the carpet. I was worried that the mats would shift around a lot, but so far they've stayed in place.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Look great and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: What a deal! These look great and fit my Ford Explorer perfectly No trimming needed. Great price, too. They were probably at least 15 dollars more expensive at the Big Box Store!! I have horses and needed heavy duty mats to protect the carpet from mud, hay, etc.Should last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Not a Vine member

customer_reviews.title: great mats
customer_reviews.text: Yes these do smell like others have said. I laid mine out in the driveway till I was done putting seat covers on I had just gotten as well. Then I wiped each one down with Armor car wipes. Immediately half the smell was about gone. Cut them to fit, put them in the car, and left my windows cracked for the night (car was in the garage). Now I get in, and it's more like just a faint new car smell or something. Nothing overpowering..... And those carpet claws on the front ones work GREAT.... no sliding at ALL.... very happy. XD
customer_reviews.author: Azhrei

customer_reviews.title: Driver's side mat does not fit 2017 Kia Soul in any shape or form
customer_reviews.text: Back mats fit perfectly - no big surprise. The front mats driver side mat did not fit well, and by the time I figured it out - it pretty much was too mangled to do anything but make it work. I had to cut all the trim lines and then notch the driver's side at the gas peddle side to make sure the gas peddle wouldn't get stuck underneath. I may still have to cut it more - or I may just have to toss it. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Harper

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size, not for Mustang
customer_reviews.text: I searched all season car mats specifically for Mustang, 2000 model. This brand claimed to fit and it was cut to fit type too. Well, even after cutting from the edges what can be cut, it seems like this mat was longer than the space I have on all four locations ( driver, passenger and back two places), it sort of folded in order to fit. Mat on the driver side was not wide enough under the pedals ( accelerator, brake and clutch) and yet below close to seat portion was way too wide even after cutting. If you own a mustang, I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy

customer_reviews.title: Fit great, perfect mats
customer_reviews.text: They fit my 2018 Hyundai Elantra perfectly. I didn’t think the back mats were too small like some reviews mentioned, and I didn’t need to trim the edges of any. The claws on the bottom keep them from sliding and I don’t think they are sharp/long enough to do any damage to the floors of my car. Slight rubbery smell when I opened up the bag, but it dissipated quickly.
customer_reviews.author: BrokenFamily UnitedBy AmazonPrime

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: For under $20 these are great quality. Keeps the dirt away from my carpet car floors and seem expensive. Fit perfectly in my 2018 Mazda CX-5. The mats in the back are a little small but works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my compact car. After measuring the floor area it was apparent they would fit edge to edge or perhaps wall to wall is a better description. Very heavy duty. They stay in place, no sliding around like so many others I have tried. I am totally satisfied. Also a great choice if you don't need the rear floor mats.
customer_reviews.author: Mic

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Price
customer_reviews.text: Nice, heavy duty mats that are great quality and price. They fit perfect in my 2020 Ford Escape. I almost spent $150+ on the factory leather mats, but so glad I gave these a shot first. No need for trimming either.
customer_reviews.author: Britt V.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & hardy!
customer_reviews.text: I like these because you can cut them to your liking. They were a little harder for me to get right since I have a really small car, but they catch dirt/rain really well & are simple to clean! I have had them for 10 months & they show no sign of wear. No nasty smell, & they stay in place, even if you do a lot of moving around. I really like these mats.
customer_reviews.author: Shanel H

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Floor Mats without High Prices
customer_reviews.text: Nice Floor Mats, Durable! They came in a box, no wrapping or coverage. Just a big individual box. Good, thick quality material. Fit my car PERFECT! Only issue I had was the back mats came as one, So I had to CAREFULLY cut down center! Other than that... nice quality without HIGH prices
customer_reviews.author: Superwmn

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this purchase!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These mats are so great. I purchased a new car with two kids and wanted to protect my floors from all of their crumbs and mess. These mats are very affordable, don’t have a smell and seem to be extremely durable. I think they will last a long time. I am so impressed with the quality for the price. They are comparable to mats my fil spent $100’s on. Would recommend! (I drive a 2019 corolla for size reference.)
customer_reviews.author: Trent C.

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are great! We bought a new Patriot Latitude '16 and wanted to protect the upholstery as much as possible. The front mats had to be cut down of course and the back mats were a bit wide (with no area shown to be pre-cut), but we made it all work and I am thoroughly pleased with the end results. They look nice with our black interior and are made out of a thick, sturdy material. I intend on buying Armor All's Rubber Cargo Mat next as it also looks like a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Size for 2011 Civic Sedan
customer_reviews.text: I was going off other Civic reviews instead of measuring. The back two are half the width needed for any car, and the driver's side too long and wide. I know they can be cut, but needs too much adjustment to accommodate gas lever, emergency pedal, gas and brake. Fit passenger front side fit fine. Seem quality, and easy to cut.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my 2016 Corolla
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my original Corolla mats. These are heavy and sturdy, I didn’t have to do much for the front seat flooring, the back I had to cut both mats off and then lay the center piece down and put the two mats on top. They do have grooves where it connects in a way that I’m not worried about them separating. Considering it’s universal it worked even though it wasn’t 100% fit for my driver side. Overall I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Saved wear on carpet
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 2door civic Honda coup Fits perfect Keeps the dirt out of my carpet Easy to clean Little soap an water an your done
customer_reviews.author: patsy sykes

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit Honda Fit 2015 as intended but you can make it work.
customer_reviews.text: These are great mats but they do not fit a Honda Fit 2015 the way they are intended. You have to put the longer ones in the back and the shorter ones in the front. You could use the longer ones in the front if you significantly trimmed them but I didn't want to do that. I do not mind switching them around. They still cover more than enough floor this way.
customer_reviews.author: Dunigan

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for just something to cover the floor in your car, these mats are perfect. I purchased these mats for my 2013 Chevy Cruze just to keep the dirt off the carpets and it does it job. I didn’t want to break the bank of floor mats so I gave these a shot and I’m happy with my decision. I don’t think they would hold up well for my fellow northern New York friends or anywhere else that gets excessive salt because there’s not much of a lip to the mat. I would purchase this product again if I had to and you can’t beat them for the price
customer_reviews.author: alyssa gagnon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Substantial material, easy to trim with household scissors. These mats look expensive, stay in place, and seem excellent in quality. The only reason I gave a 4 stars on durability is that I've only had them for about a month, however I expect them to last a long time. I'll definitely buy another set if/when I get a new vehicle if theses don't fit!
customer_reviews.author: RS from LA

customer_reviews.title: good product - great price
customer_reviews.text: These mats seem quite durable. I have a single cab 2017 F150 that has rubber floors already, so the mats do slide around. I'm going to try some double-sided gorilla tape on them and see if that solves the problem. I have tried placing some of that no-slip grip stuff that is used on indoor rugs and it doesn't help.
customer_reviews.author: edl

product_meta.title: Armor All 78841 4-Piece Grey All Season Rubber Floor Mat
product_meta.description: Color:Grey| Style:4-PieceArmor All all-weather floor mats are designed to be trimmed so that they may be customized to fit almost any vehicle. They are engineered to ensure the mats will not curl, crack or harden in sub-zero weather. The product also features 'Carpet Claw' anti-slip backing.
feature_bullets: HEAVY DUTY RUBBER FLOOR MATS: These rubber floor mats protect your car's floors from dert & debris. Improved deeper tread pattern holds water, snow, & mud.
SUB-ZERO WEATHER: The 4-piece carpet floor mat set is designed to fit almost any vehicle. They are engineered to ensure the mats will not curl, crack or harden in sub-zero weather.

VEHICLE FLOOR MATS: Keep your car or truck cleaner for longer periods of time with a variety of heavy duty floor mats for the front and back seats of your vehicle. Protect original flooring from permanent grass & dirt stains.

INTERIOR & EXTERIOR CAR ACCESSORIES: We provide you with plenty of car auto accessories to customize your vehicle. Check out our floor mats, deer alerts, phone cup holders, chargers Bluetooth speakers & more!

ARMOR ALL: An industry leader in car care appearance products & with pure passion for vehicle detail, Armor All has been committed for over 50 years to make your car, truck or SUV look amazing inside & out.

specifications.Cover Included: Custom Accessories Armor All 78841 4-Piece Grey All Season Rubber Floor Mat
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars8,209 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
